reviewText: This is a half hour news special from 2005. I should have known it was going to be that way seeing "ABC News" on the product description, but was in  a state of delusion then, thinking it would be a feature length PBS type of documentary. The minutes flew by though, and the interview with the Lipstick Jihadist author was informative. I think I'd only recommend it to hardcore Ted Koppel fans though, which sadly I know none as of now.
